argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwsle.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |
| 2 |  | pwsle.v | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | pwsle.o | |- O = ( le ` R ) |
| 4 |  | pwsle.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` Y ) |
| 5 |  | pwsleval.r | |- ( ph -> R e. V ) |
| 6 |  | pwsleval.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 7 |  | pwsleval.a | |- ( ph -> F e. B ) |
| 8 |  | pwsleval.b | |- ( ph -> G e. B ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_pwsle | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> .<_ = ( oR O i^i ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 6, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> .<_ = ( oR O i^i ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_breqd | |- ( ph -> ( F .<_ G <-> F ( oR O i^i ( B X. B ) ) G ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_brinxp | |- ( ( F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( F oR O G <-> F ( oR O i^i ( B X. B ) ) G ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 8, 12 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( F oR O G <-> F ( oR O i^i ( B X. B ) ) G ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 15 | 1, 14, 2, 5, 6, 7 | #P_pwselbas | |- ( ph -> F : I --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( F : I --> ( Base ` R ) -> F Fn I ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F Fn I ) |
| 18 | 1, 14, 2, 5, 6, 8 | #P_pwselbas | |- ( ph -> G : I --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( G : I --> ( Base ` R ) -> G Fn I ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G Fn I ) |
| 21 |  | #P_inidm | |- ( I i^i I ) = I |
| 22 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( F ` x ) = ( F ` x ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( G ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) |
| 24 | 17, 20, 6, 6, 21, 22, 23 | #P_ofrfval | |- ( ph -> ( F oR O G <-> A. x e. I ( F ` x ) O ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 25 | 11, 13, 24 | #P_3bitr2d | |- ( ph -> ( F .<_ G <-> A. x e. I ( F ` x ) O ( G ` x ) ) ) |
